alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 10:05AM EST until further notice by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Huron River Near Hamburg affecting Livingston County. For the Huron River...including Milford, Hamburg, Ann Arbor...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Huron River near Hamburg. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hold around a crest of 7.3 feet this afternoon and tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM.this evening at 1115 PM EST.
